name: Holy Mantle
originalText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from creatures.

rulings.text: The enchanted creature can’t be blocked, it can’t be targeted by abilities of creatures or creature cards (like, notably, the scavenge ability), and all damage dealt to it by creatures or creature cards is prevented.
